messages.content:
Hey Marcus! Great to meet you - I'm CJ, your AI support lead. I'm here 24/7 monitoring our customer interactions and ready to help with whatever you need.

I'm currently keeping an eye on our support operations. We've got 33 tickets coming in daily on average, with our team maintaining a solid 4.4 CSAT score and 3.2-hour response time. The main things customers are reaching out about are shipping questions, account management, and product feedback.

What can I help you with today? Whether it's diving into specific support issues, analyzing customer patterns, or just checking on how things are running - I'm here and ready to assist!

Is there a specific area of support you'd like me to dive deeper on, or something particular that's on your mind?
